block.p: ARCH CHEMICALS INC., Norwalk, Conn., which makes water chemicals, agreed to sell the assets of a unit, Superior Pool Products Inc., a distributor of swimming pool equipment, to the SCP Pool Corp., Covington, La., a pool equipment distributor, for an undisclosed price.
ALPHARMA INC., Fort Lee, N.J., a maker of generic drugs, said it bought a 20 percent stake in Indiemed.com Ltd., a new European pharmaceuticals exchange on the Internet. Terms were not disclosed.

CORNING INC., Corning, N.Y., which makes optical fiber, cable and other products for the telecommunications industry, said its unit, Corning Cable Systems, planned to build a plant in Hickory, N.C., to produce flame retardant optical fiber cable, which would add about 300 jobs.
